word:
Psalm 147

   4 (Psalm 19:1-3; see EGW on Isaiah 60:1). The World Only a Jot.--He made the night, marshaling the shining stars in the firmament. He calls them all by name. The heavens declare the glory of God, and the firmament showeth his handiwork, showing man that this little world is but a jot in God's creation (YI April 4, 1905).
